title: Local Health Official Records and Reports to State Health Department
content:
Local Health Official Records and Reports to State Health Department

State Regulations
§ 43-1.15 - Records and reports
§ 43-1.16 - Return of a tuberculosis patient to location of residence
§ 43-1.17 - Commissioner's orders
§ 43-1.18 - Violations by a provider

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
